ffffs001 Alchemical Potion
Rarity: Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Alchemical Potion
EQUIP: Any. UNEQUIP: Drop. EFFECT: When equipped, place the Alchemical Potion in the circle on the back of this card with the arrow indicator pointing to the color of your choice. // FREE: Roll a d6. Turn the Alchemical Potion clockwise a number of colors equal to the result. The character can use that power until your next turn. 1 - Poison, 2 - Empower, 3 - Close Combat Expert, 4 - Plasticity, 5 - Incapacitate, 6 - Enhancement, 7 - Exploit Weakness, 8 - Pulse Wave, 9 - Energy Explosion, 10 - Flurry, 11 - Telekinesis, 12 - Regeneration. Light Object.
10 Points
Trade Alchemical Potion Want Alchemical Potion
